AssetData.label: CAPEX (Pmax)
AssetData.doc: Capital expenditure (only used for capacity optimization)

AssetData.label: Fixed Operating Costs
AssetData.doc: Fixed Operating Costs (only used for capacity optimization)

AssetData.label: Pmax
AssetData.doc: Installed power capacity

AssetData.label: Min Pmax
AssetData.doc: Installed capacity lower bound for capacity optimization

AssetData.label: Max Pmax
AssetData.doc: Installed capacity upper bound for capacity optimization

AssetData.label: Output availability
AssetData.doc: Available capacity, expressed as a percentage of the installed capacity

AssetData.label: Input availability
AssetData.doc: Input availability for storage assets

AssetData.label: Production cost
AssetData.doc: Production cost (fuel cost not included)

AssetData.label: Consumption cost
AssetData.doc: Consumption costs

AssetData.label: Min load
AssetData.doc: Minimum production level, expressed as a percentage of the available capacity

AssetData.label: CAPEX (Storage)
AssetData.doc: Capital expenditure for storage assets

AssetData.label: Storage capacity
AssetData.doc: Storage capacity

AssetData.label: Discharge time
AssetData.doc: Discharge time

AssetData.label: Storage availability
AssetData.doc: Storage availability, expressed as a percentage of the installed storage capacity

AssetData.label: Input efficiency
AssetData.doc: Pumping efficiency

AssetData.label: Output efficiency
AssetData.doc: Turbining efficiency

AssetData.label: Min storage level
AssetData.doc: Minimum level for storage, expressed as a percentage of the installed storage capacity

AssetData.label: Storage initial level
AssetData.doc: Initial storage level, expressed as a percentage of the installed storage capacity

AssetData.label: Water inflow
AssetData.doc: Production quota

AssetData.label: Storage cost
AssetData.doc: Cost associated with storage

AssetData.label: Input Pmax
AssetData.doc: Input maximal power

AssetData.label: Starting cost
AssetData.doc: Cost to start additional capacity

AssetData.label: Running cost
AssetData.doc: Cost associated with maintaining a certain running capacity

AssetData.label: Running capacity min load
AssetData.doc: Minimum level for the production, expressed as a percentage of the running capacity (for assets in fleet mode with reserve, please refer to addReserveProduction(..) for the running capacity definition)

AssetData.label: Min off time
AssetData.doc: When a part of the running capacity is switched off, this part cannot be switch on before a duration equals to _minOffTime

AssetData.label: Max share to upward sync. reserve
AssetData.doc: Maximal share of upward sync. reserve in running capacity

AssetData.label: Max share to downward sync. reserve
AssetData.doc: Maximal share of downward sync. reserve in running capacity

AssetData.label: Max share to upward reserve
AssetData.doc: Maximal share of upward mFRR and sync. reserve in running capacity

AssetData.label: Max share to downward reserve
AssetData.doc: Maximal share of downward mFRR and sync. reserve in running capacity

AssetData.label: Op. cost of the upward sync. reserve
AssetData.doc: Operating cost of the upward sync. reserve

AssetData.label: Op. cost of the downward sync. reserve
AssetData.doc: Operating cost of the downward sync. reserve

AssetData.label: Op. cost of upward mFRR
AssetData.doc: Operating cost of upward mFRR

AssetData.label: Op. cost of downward mFRR
AssetData.doc: Operating cost of downward mFRR

AssetData.label: Cost for not running upward mFRR
AssetData.doc: Cost associated with the mfrr reserve procurement from non-running capacity

Models.Model: # --------------------------------------------------- # Modelling asset state ON # --------------------------------------------------- stateON = AssetState('ON') addEnergyProduction(asset, stateON) addEnergyConsumption(asset, stateON, availability="_availabilityIn") addDischargeStock(asset, stateON, minStorageLevel="_minStorageLevel", inputEfficiency="_inputEfficiency", outputEfficiency="_outputEfficiency", initialStorageLevel="_initialStorageLevel", storageAvailability="_storageAvailability") addReserveProduction(asset, stateON, isQuickStart=True, isFleetModeEnabled=True) finalize(stateON)
